data.actual_result: Filter option menu doesn't do anything
data.expected_result: The filter option menu should do its job, eventually by removing the space if it's not supported
data.short_description: Filter options in the Quick Switcher do nothing if the search query starts with some special characters (verified with space, exclamation mark, and underscore. Haven't tested all)
data.steps_to_repro: - Open Quick Switcher - In the searchbar, input any special character other than *, @ and # - Tap the three lines icon to the right of the search bar and pick any filter option
